text: This is great, do we have to sign up for the beta or the components are available?
Hey, just want to confirm, long project build times are associated with having too many external modules correct? I'll time the next one but it feels like at least a few minutes every time

if I am using `DOMParser` and `serverSideProps`, does it make more sense to set my island to `clientOnly` or should I do a check inside of the island? I'm currently using `clientOnly` but I want to make sure I'm not missing anything
Yes, external packages are the main driven of build times.

is there a recommended way to remove unused packages? best idea so far is to search for each dependency in vscode and delete the ones I don't find...but I'm not sure if that accounts for cross-dependencies?
